original_text: “But if you fail to do this, you will be sinning against the Lord; and you may be sure that your sin will find you out.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 그같이 아니하면 여호와께 범죄함이니 너희 죄가 반드시 너희를 찾아낼 줄 알라

sentences.original_text: But if you fail to do this
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 너희가 이것을 행하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: you will be sinning against the Lord
that your sin will find you out
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 죄가 반드시 너희를 찾아낼 것이라
